title: Rock clear gloss like Alia Bhatt
text:
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Alia ðÂÂ¸ (@aliaabhatt) on Oct 13, 2019 at 9:31am PDT

1. Use a clarifying face mask for 15 minutes to prep your skin.2. Follow a CTM routine, and use lip scrub on your pout.3. Apply a pore minimising primer on your face that suits your skin type.4. Blend a hydrating foundation on to your face and neck.5. Conceal any blemishes with a concealer.6. Use an eyebrow wax to style your brows and keep them in place.7. Apply a silver-toned liquid highlighter on the cheekbones, temples, inner corners of the eyes, brow bones, bridge of your nose, and Cupid’s bow.8. Contour with a bronzer below your cheekbones.9. Tight line the upper and lower lash line with a brown kohl pencil.10. Use a generous amount of volumising mascara.11. Apply a clear shimmer lip gloss to your lips.12. Set your makeup with a spritz of makeup setting spray.
description: Alia Bhatt takes minimalistic makeup to the next level. She flaunted glass-like skin with clear lip gloss and wowed the crowd.
